text: shane_walsh Oh yeah .
lori_grimes We do n't need to talk about that .
amy_harrison and andrea are fishing out in a boat .
amy_harrison What ?
andrea_harrison Nothing .
amy_harrison It 's not nothing . It 's always something .
andrea_harrison Did n't dad teach you to tie nail knots ?
amy_harrison Why would he do that ? He only ever used a fisherman 's knot . One knot .
andrea_harrison No , he did n't . No , he tied at least three .
amy_harrison Clinch knots ? No way .
andrea_harrison Fine , I 'm making it up . Did dad teach you mostly dry lures ?
amy_harrison Yeah . You ?
andrea_harrison Wet .
amy_harrison You 're kidding . But he was always so adamant . I mean , you know dad on the fishing thing .
andrea_harrison Gee , you think ? I only spent my entire childhood with my ass in a boat . But in my day it was all about getting the hook seated . We were fishing for the dinner table .
amy_harrison Not us . We always threw them back . Always .
andrea_harrison I guess he changed things up .
amy_harrison But that 'd be like changing his religion or something .
andrea_harrison People change . It 's not his fault we were born 12 years apart .
amy_harrison No . No , because the minute you went off to college it was my ass in that boat and he taught me dry lures from day one . This was not behavior developed over time .
andrea_harrison You think he did it for us ?
amy_harrison Because he knew we were so different . He knew that you needed to catch the fish and I needed to throw them back .
andrea_harrison All right , remember his rule No crying in the boat . It scares the fish .
amy_harrison Mom and dad . I mean , maybe Florida was n't hit so bad . Maybe it 's better there . Do you think ?
andrea_harrison I think you have a bite . Even with the wrong knots .
amy_harrison Oh God . So much for the no crying rule .

andrea_harrison I think that was more for dad than the fish The two girls smile . dale stands on top of the RV to keep watch for Walkers . He sees jim over in the bushes digging holes . He realizes that jim has been at it for quite awhile . jim has dug several separate holes . In Atlanta , T - Dog , Daryl , glenn and rick still stare at Merle 's severed hand . daryl turns his crossbow on t - dog to kill him , but rick pulls out his Python .
rick_grimes I wo n't hesitate . I do n't care if every walker in the city hears it daryl realizes rick is being honest and lowers the crossbow .
daryl_dixon You got a do - rag or something ? t - dog hands him one and daryl picks up Merle 's severed hand that is already decaying .
daryl_dixon I guess the saw blade was too dull for the handcuffs . Ai n't that a bitch He puts the hand in Glenn 's backpack .
daryl_dixon He must have used a tourniquet . maybe his belt . Be much more blood if he did n't daryl notices a blood trail . The group starts to follow it . t - dog picks up the tools on the roof .
daryl_dixon Merle ? You in here ? The group walks down the stairs . dale walks out to see Jim .

dale_horvath Jim ? You okay ? You keep this up , you 're gon na keel over out here . Drink some water at least jim continues to dig holes and does n't respond to him . daryl shoots a Walker in an office with his crossbow . The group walks in and makes sure the coast is clear .
daryl_dixon Had enough in him to take out these two sumbitches . One handed . Toughest asshole I ever met , my brother . Feed him a hammer , he 'd crap out nails .
rick_grimes Any man can pass out from blood loss , no matter how tough he is amy and andrea come back to the camp with tons of fish for the camp .
morales Oh , baby . Will you look at that ? Hey , check it out . Ladies . Because of you my children will eat tonight . Thank you .
andrea_harrison Thank Dale . It 's his canoe and gear .
carl_grimes Mom , look . Look at all the fish .
lori_grimes Thank you .
carl_grimes Whoa .
lori_grimes Yeah , whoa . Where did you two learn to do that ?
amy_harrison Our dad .
carl_grimes Can you teach me how to do that ?
amy_harrison Sure . I 'll teach you all about nail knots and stuff . If that 's okay .
lori_grimes You wo n't catch me arguing .
andrea_harrison Hey , Dale . When 's the last time you oiled those line reels ? They are a disgrace dale does n't seem as happy as he usually is .

dale_horvath I , uh , I do n't want to alarm anyone , but we may have a bit of a problem shane comes up to the group . dale points over to jim who is still digging the holes . The group continues to search for Merle . daryl shouts for Merle .
daryl_dixon Merle !
rick_grimes We 're not alone here . Remember ?
daryl_dixon Screw that . He could be bleeding out . You said so yourself They come upon a kitchen where a stove is still lighted .
theodore_douglas Shh They find Merle 's belt sitting on the top of it .
glenn_rhee What 's that burned stuff ?
rick_grimes Skin . He cauterized the stump .
daryl_dixon Told you he was tough . Nobody can kill Merle but Merle .
rick_grimes Do n't take that on faith . He 's lost a lot of blood .
daryl_dixon Yeah ? Did n't stop him from busting out of this death trap .
glenn_rhee He left the building ? Why the hell would he do that ? They come to a smashed window and they realize Merle left .
daryl_dixon Why would n't he ? He 's out there alone as far as he knows , doing what he 's got to do . Surviving .
theodore_douglas You call that surviving ? Just wandering out in the streets , maybe passing out ? What are his odds out there ?
daryl_dixon No worse than being handcuffed and left to rot by you sorry pricks . You could n't kill him . Ai n't so worried about some dumb dead b*st*rd .
rick_grimes What about 1 , 000 dumb dead bastards ? Different story ?
daryl_dixon Why do n't you take a tally ? Do what you want . I 'm gon na go get him rick does n't let him go .
rick_grimes Daryl , wait .
daryl_dixon Get your hands off me ! You ca n't stop me .

rick_grimes I do n't blame you . He 's family , I get that . I went through hell to find mine . I know exactly how you feel . He ca n't get far with that injury . We could help you check a few blocks around but only if we keep a level head .
daryl_dixon I could do that .
theodore_douglas Only if we get those guns first . I 'm not strolling the streets of Atlanta with just my good intentions , okay ? jim is still digging holes . The whole camp comes out to see him .
shane_walsh Hey , Jim . Jim , why do n't you hold up , all right ? Just give me a second here , please .
jim What do you want ?
shane_walsh We 're all just a little concerned , that 's all .
morales dale says you 've been out here for hours .
jim So ?
shane_walsh So why are you digging ? Are you heading to China , Jim ?
jim What does it matter ? I 'm not hurting anyone .
dale_horvath Yeah , except maybe yourself . It 's a hundred degrees today . You ca n't keep this up .
jim Sure I can . Watch me .
lori_grimes Jim , they 're not gon na say it so I will . You 're scaring people . You 're scaring my son and Carol 's daughter .
jim They got nothing to be scared of . I mean , what the hell , people ? I 'm out here by myself . Why do n't you all just go and leave me the hell alone ?

shane_walsh We think that you need to take a break , okay ? Why do n't you go and get yourself in the shade ? Some food maybe . I 'll tell you what . maybe in a little bit I 'll come out here and help you myself . Jim , just tell me what it 's about . Why do n't you just go ahead and give me that shovel ?
jim Or what ?
shane_walsh There is no or what . I 'm asking you . I 'm coming to you and I 'm asking you , please . I do n't want to have to take it from you .

jim And if I do n't , then what ? Then you 're gon na beat my face in like ed Peletier , are n't you ? Y'all seen his face , huh ? What 's left of it . See , now that 's what happens when someone crosses you .
shane_walsh That was different , jim .
amy_harrison You were n't there . ed was out of control . He was hurting his wife .
jim That is their marriage . That is not his . He is not judge and jury . Who voted you king boss , huh ?
shane_walsh Jim , I 'm not here to argue with you , all right ? Just give me the shovel , okay ?
jim No no no .
shane_walsh Just give me the -- Jim ! jim shoves shane away and then threatens to hit him with it . shane tackles jim to the ground .
shane_walsh Okay , shh shh .
jim You got no right !
shane_walsh Stop . Shh .
jim You got no right !
shane_walsh Jim , just stop it . Hey hey hey hey .
jim Do n't !
shane_walsh Jim . Jim , nobody 's gon na hurt you . You hear me ? Shh . Jim , nobody is gon na hurt you , okay ?

jim Your dad 's a police officer , son . He helps people . Probably just came across some folks needing help , that 's all . That man , he is tough as nails . I do n't know him well but . I could see it in him . Am I right ?

jim That 's a lie . That 's the biggest lie there is . I told that to my wife and my two boys . I said it 100 times . It did n't matter . They came out of nowhere . There were dozens of 'em . Just pulled 'em right out of my hands . You know , the only reason I got away was 'cause the dead were too busy eating my family .
rick_grimes You 're not doing this alone .
daryl_dixon Even I think it 's a bad idea and I do n't even like you much .

glenn_rhee It 's a good idea , okay , if you just hear me out . If we go out there in a group , we 're slow , drawing attention . If I 'm alone , I can move fast He draws a map of the street on the ground and marks the tank and the bag of guns .
glenn_rhee Look . That 's the tank , five blocks from where we are now . That 's the bag of guns . Here 's the alley I dragged you into when we first met . That 's where daryl and I will go .
daryl_dixon Why me ?
glenn_rhee Your crossbow is quieter than his gun . While daryl waits here in the alley , I run up the street , grab the bag .
rick_grimes You got us elsewhere ? glenn points down the street .
glenn_rhee You and T - Dog , right . You 'll be in this alley here .
rick_grimes Two blocks away ? Why ?

glenn_rhee I may not be able to come back the same way . Walkers might cut me off . If that happens , I wo n't go back to Daryl . I 'll go forward instead , all the way around to that alley where you guys are . Whichever direction I go , I got you in both places to cover me . Afterwards , we 'll all meet back here .
daryl_dixon Hey , kid , what 'd you do before all this ?
glenn_rhee Delivered pizzas . Why ? glenn & amp ; daryl crawl down the ladder and run down the alley . rick & amp ; t - dog head down the other alley . daryl loads his crossbow .
daryl_dixon You got some balls for a chinaman .
glenn_rhee I 'm Korean .

daryl_dixon Whatever glenn runs down the street . Several Walkers notice him , but do n't aggressively chase him yet . While daryl waits behind the trashcan , a young man of Mexican descent , Miguel , walks down the alley . daryl spots him and points his crossbow at him .
miguel Whoa , do n't shoot me ! What do you want ?
daryl_dixon I 'm looking for my brother . He 's hurt real bad . You seen him ?
miguel Ayudame !

daryl_dixon Shut up ! You 're gon na bring the geeks down on us . Answer me glenn notices the Walkers start to converge on him as he grabs the bag of guns and Rick 's sheriff 's hat . He runs back down the street he came .
daryl_dixon Answer me .
miguel Ayudame ! Ayudame ! Ayudame ! rick & amp ; t - dog hear yelling help and start to run over to glenn and Daryl 's alley .

daryl_dixon Shut up . Shut up . Shut up . Shut up Two other Mexicans , one of them named Felipe , also come down the alley and they start to beat up Daryl . glenn comes back with the guns and sees what is happening .

felipe That 's it . That 's the bag , Vato . Take it ! Take it ! starts to run towards him and tries to grab the bag of guns . They grab glenn and hold him hostage . daryl shoots in the rear end with his crossbow and cries out in pain .
felipe Ah ! Ah !

glenn_rhee Get off me ! Get off me ! Daryl ! Daryl ! Daryl ! A car pulls up and they start to back up . One of the Walkers is crushed by one of the Mexicans . With no guns , but glenn as a hostage , the group flees leaving miguel behind as well .
daryl_dixon Come back here , you sumbitches ! daryl grabs the gate and shuts it before the Walkers can get at them . rick & amp ; t - dog arrive to see what happened .
rick_grimes Whoa whoa whoa . Stop it .
daryl_dixon I 'm gon na kick your nuts up in your throat !
miguel Let me go .
theodore_douglas Chill out .
daryl_dixon They took Glenn . That little b*st*rd and his little b*st*rd homie friends . I 'm gon na stomp your ass !
theodore_douglas Guys ! Guys ! We 're cut off !
rick_grimes Get to the lab . Go .

daryl_dixon Come on . Damn , let 's go rick picks up the bag of guns and his hat and the group runs back into the building . jim is tied to a tree to protect him from hurting anyone or himself . shane and dale come up to him with some water .
shane_walsh Jim , take some water ?
jim All right .
shane_walsh Yeah ? All right . Here you go , bud .
jim Pour some on my head ?
shane_walsh Yeah . Cooling you down , huh ?
jim Yeah . How long you gon na keep me like this ?
shane_walsh Well , yeah . Until I do n't think that you 're a danger to yourself or others .
jim Sorry if I scared your boy and your little girl .
lori_grimes You had sunstroke . Nobody 's blaming you .
jim You 're not scared now , are you ?
sophia No sir jim is glad to hear that .
jim Your mama 's right . Sun just cooked my head is all .
dale_horvath Jim , do you know why you were digging ? Can you say ?
jim I had a reason . Do n't remember . Something I dreamt last night . Your dad was in it . You were too . You were worried about him . Ca n't remember the rest . You worried about your dad ?
carl_grimes They 're not back yet .
jim There ai n't nothing gon na stop him from getting back here to you and your mom , I promise you that .
shane_walsh All right . Who wants to help me clean some fish , huh ?
carl_grimes Sweet . Come on , sophia sophia and carl run after shane and carol joins them .
lori_grimes Stay with Carol , all right ? lori approaches Jim .
jim You keep your boy close . You do n't ever let him out of your sight lori nods in agreement and goes to join them .
rick_grimes Those men you were with , we need to know where they went .
miguel I ai n't telling you nothing .
theodore_douglas Jesus , man . What the hell happened back there ?
daryl_dixon I told you , this little turd and his douche bag friends came out of nowhere and jumped me .
miguel You 're the one who jumped me , puto , screaming about trying to find his brother like it 's my damn fault .
daryl_dixon They took Glenn . Could have taken Merle too miguel chuckles .
miguel Merle ? What kind of hick name is that ? I would n't name my dog Merle daryl goes to kick at Miguel , but rick holds him back .
rick_grimes Damn it , Daryl . Back off daryl pulls out Merle 's hand .
daryl_dixon Want to see what happened to the last guy that pissed me off ? miguel is freaked out by the hand and starts to back away .
daryl_dixon Start with the feet this time rick holds daryl back .
rick_grimes The men you were with took our friend . All we want to do is talk to them , see if we can work something out The group arrives at the hideout .
rick_grimes You sure you 're up for this ?
theodore_douglas Yeah .
rick_grimes Okay .
daryl_dixon One wrong move , you get an arrow in the ass . Just so you know .
miguel G 's gon na take that arrow out of my ass and shove it up yours . Just so you know .
rick_grimes G ?
miguel Guillermo . He 's the man here .
rick_grimes Okay then . Let 's go see guillermo They walk up to the building and the doors open up . guillermo walks out .
guillermo You okay , little man ?
miguel They 're gon na cut off my feet , carnal .
guillermo Cops do that ?
miguel Not him . This redneck puto here . He cut off some dude 's hand , man . He showed it to me .
daryl_dixon Shut up felipe comes out and points a gun at Daryl .
felipe Hey , that 's that Vato right there , homes . He shot me in the ass with an arrow . What 's up , homes , huh ?
guillermo Chill , ese , chill . Chill . This true ? He wants Miguelito 's feet ? That 's pretty sick , man .
rick_grimes We were hoping more for a calm discussion .
guillermo That hillbilly jumps Felipe 's little cousin , beats on him , threatens to cut off his feet , felipe gets an arrow in the ass and you want a calm discussion ? You fascinate me .
rick_grimes Heat of the moment . Mistakes were made on both sides .
guillermo Who 's that dude to you anyway ? You do n't look related .
rick_grimes He 's one of our group , more or less . I 'm sure you have a few like him .
daryl_dixon You got my brother in there ?
guillermo Sorry , we 're fresh out of white boys . But I 've got Asian . You interested ?
rick_grimes I have one of yours , you have one of mine . Sounds like an even trade .
guillermo Do n't sound even to me .
miguel G. Come on , man .
guillermo My people got attacked . Where 's the compensation for their pain and suffering ? More to the point , where 's my bag of guns ?
rick_grimes Guns ?
guillermo The bag miguel saw in the street . The bag felipe and Jorge were going back to get . That bag of guns .
rick_grimes You 're mistaken .
guillermo I do n't think so .
rick_grimes About It being yours . It 's my bag of guns .

guillermo The bag was in the street . Anybody could come around and say it was theirs . I 'm supposed to take your word ? What 's to stop my people from unloading on you right here and now and I take what 's mine ?
rick_grimes You could do that . Or not He indicates to the wall and t - dog has the sniper rifle pointed at Guillermo .
theodore_douglas Come on , man . Make the trade . Please .
guillermo Oye Two men appear on the roof with Glenn .

guillermo I see two options . You come back with miguel and my bag of guns , everybody walks . Or you come back locked and loaded , we 'll see which side spills more blood The Vatos head back into the hideout and shut the door . rick unzips the bag of guns and starts to divide them .
daryl_dixon Them guns are worth more than gold . Gold wo n't protect your family or put food on the table . You 're gon na give that up for that kid ?
theodore_douglas If I knew we 'd get glenn back , I might agree . But you think that Vato across the way is just gon na hand him over ?
miguel You calling G a liar ?
daryl_dixon Are you apart of this ? You want to hold onto your teeth ? daryl slaps him .
theodore_douglas Question is , do you trust that man 's word ?
daryl_dixon No , question is what are you willing to bet on it ? Could be more than them guns . Could be your life . glenn worth that to you ?
rick_grimes What life I have I owe to him . I was nobody to Glenn , just some idiot stuck in a tank . He could have walked away , but he did n't . Neither will I.
daryl_dixon So you 're gon na hand the guns over ?
rick_grimes I did n't say that . There 's nothing keeping you two here . You should get out , head back to camp .
theodore_douglas And tell your family what ?
miguel Come on , this is nuts . Just do like g says The group leads back with his hands tied behind his back . The doors open and rick pushes in .
guillermo I see my guns but they 're not all in the bag .
rick_grimes That 's because they 're not yours . I thought I mentioned that .
felipe Let 's just shoot these fools right now , ese . All right ? Unload on their asses , ese .
guillermo I do n't think you fully appreciate the gravity of the situation .
rick_grimes No , I 'm pretty clear rick cuts miguel free .
rick_grimes You have your man . I want mine .

guillermo I 'm gon na chop up your boy . I 'm gon na feed him to my dogs . They 're the evilest , nastiest man - eating bitches you ever saw . I picked them up from Satan at a yard sale . I told you how it has to be . Are you woefully deaf ?
rick_grimes No , my hearing 's fine . You said come locked and loaded Everyone cocks their guns and rick points his gun at Guillermo .
rick_grimes Okay then , we 're here Suddenly , an old woman comes out from behind the group and shouts for Felipe .
abuela Felipe ! Felipe !
felipe Abuela , go back with the others . now .
daryl_dixon Get that old lady out of line of fire !
guillermo Abuela , listen to your mijo , okay ? This is the not the place for you right now .
abuela Mr. Gilbert is having trouble breathing . He needs his asthma stuff . Carlitos did n't find it . He needs his medicine .
guillermo Felipe , go take care of it , okay ? And take your grandmother with you .
felipe Abuela ! Ven conmigo por favor .
abuela Who are those men ?
felipe Por favor , ven conmigo .
abuela Do n't you take him .
rick_grimes Ma'am ?
abuela Felipe 's a good boy . He has his trouble but he pulls himself together . We need him here .
rick_grimes Ma'am , I 'm not here to arrest your grandson .
abuela Then what do you want him for ?
rick_grimes He 's . Helping us find a missing person . Fella named glenn .
abuela The Asian boy ? He 's with Mr. Gilbert . Come . Come , I 'll show you The grandmother takes Rick 's hand and takes him .
abuela He needs his medicine .
guillermo Let 'em pass The Vatos let them pass . The grandmother takes Rick , Daryl , and t - dog into a nursing home where a lot of elderly , sick patients are staying at .

felipe Abuela , por favor . Take me to him rick realizes that the Vatos are protecting the individuals that are staying at the home . They come into the gymnasium where they find an elderly man having an asthma attack . and glenn help him .
felipe All right . All right . Nice and easy . Just breathe . Just breathe . Just let it out . Just breathe .
women Just relax .
rick_grimes What the hell is this ?
glenn_rhee An asthma attack . Could n't get his breath all of a sudden .
theodore_douglas I thought you were being eaten by dogs , man They look at the dogs which are little Chihuahuas .
rick_grimes Could I have a word with you ? You 're the dumbest son of a bitch I ever met . We walked in there ready to kill every last one of you .
guillermo Well , I 'm glad it did n't go down that way .
rick_grimes If it had , that blood would be on my hands .

guillermo Mine too . We 'd have fought back . Would n't be the first time we 've had to . Protect the food , the medicine . what 's left of it . These people , the old ones . the staff took off , just left 'em here to die . Me and felipe were the only ones who stayed .
rick_grimes What are you doctors ?
guillermo Felipe 's a nurse . a special care provider . Me , I 'm the custodian .
rick_grimes What about the rest of your crew ?

guillermo The Vatos trickle in to check on their parents , their grandparents . They see how things are and most decide to stay . It 's a good thing too . We need the muscle . The people we 've encountered since things fell apart , the worst kind . plunderers , the kind that take by force .
rick_grimes That 's not who we are .
guillermo How was I to know ? My people got attacked and you show up with miguel hostage . appearances .
theodore_douglas Guess the world changed .

guillermo No . It 's the same as it ever was . The weak get taken . So we do what we can here . The Vatos work on those cars , talk about getting the old people out of the city . But most ca n't even get to the bathroom by themselves , still , it keeps the crew busy , and that 's worth something . So we barred all the windows , welded all the doors shut except for one entrance . The Vatos , they go out , scavenge what they can to keep us going . We watch the perimeter night and day and we wait . The people here , they all look to me now . I do n't even know why .
rick_grimes Because they can rick hands guillermo his shotgun and they divide the guns 50/50 for both groups . The four men leave the nursing home .
glenn_rhee Admit it , you only came back to Atlanta for the hat .
rick_grimes Do n't tell anybody .
daryl_dixon You 've given away half our guns and ammo .
rick_grimes Not nearly half .
daryl_dixon For what ? Bunch of old farts who are gon na die off momentarily anyhow ? Seriously , how long you think they got ?
rick_grimes How long do any of us ? They come to the spot where their truck was , but it is gone .
glenn_rhee Oh my god .
daryl_dixon Where the hell 's our van ?
glenn_rhee We left it right here . Who would take it ?
rick_grimes Merle .
daryl_dixon He 's gon na be taking some vengeance back to camp andrea searches for something in the cabinets . dale comes in .
andrea_harrison Wrapping paper , color tissue , anything ?
dale_horvath Seriously ?
andrea_harrison How can you not have anything ?
dale_horvath Had I been informed of the impending apocalypse I 'd have stocked up .
andrea_harrison It 's Amy 's birthday tomorrow . I 've been marking days on the calendar just to make sure She shows him the mermaid necklace that she got for amy at the department store in Atlanta .
andrea_harrison You do n't give a gift unwrapped .
dale_horvath Deep breath . I 'm sure I 'll find something here .
morales I , uh , built up the rocks all around . See ? So the flames can be a little higher and have 'em be hidden shane and carl walk up to Jim .
shane_walsh Hey , Jim . How you feeling , man ?
jim I 'm better . More myself now .
shane_walsh I hope you understand the need for this . this timeout . I 've got others I 've got to think about . I just want to make sure there 's no . there 's no hard feelings .
jim There 's not . I do understand .
shane_walsh Okay . Why do n't you come join in with the rest of us ? Big ol' fish fry .
jim I 'd like that very much .
shane_walsh Okay carol and sophia come to see ed in the tent . Ed 's face is bruised and he has been in the tent since the beating .
carol_peletier Why do n't you come outside with everybody ?
ed Hell with them people . Would n't piss on them if their heads were on fire sophia goes to leave , but holds onto her .
ed Hey ! Why do n't you stay here ? Keep your daddy company .
carol_peletier Ed , she wants to join in . Come on They both leave . ed continues to lie down in the tent .

ed Fine . Hell with the both of you . Ai n't no need to be bothering me no more the rest of the night As dusk approaches , Rick , Glenn , t - dog & amp ; daryl run back to camp before Merle arrives . The group enjoys a fish dinner . Everyone is having a good time .
sophia Pass the fish , please .
carol_peletier Here you go .
shane_walsh Man o man , that 's good . Whew . I miss this .
morales I 've got to ask you , man . It 's been driving me crazy .
dale_horvath What ?
morales That watch .
dale_horvath What 's wrong with my watch ?
morales I see you every day , the same time , winding that thing like a village priest saying mass .
jacqui I 've wondered this myself .
dale_horvath I 'm missing the point .
jacqui Unless I 've misread the signs , the world seems to have come to an end . At least hit a speed bump for a good long while .
morales But there 's you every day winding that stupid watch .

dale_horvath Time . it 's important to keep track , is n't it ? The days at least . Do n't you think , Andrea ? Back me up here . I like . I like what , um , a father said to son when he gave him a watch that had been handed down through generations . He said , """" I give you the mausoleum of all hope and desire , which will fit your individual needs no better than it did mine or my father 's before me ; I give it to you not that you may remember time , but that you may forget it for a moment now and then and not spend all of your breath trying to conquer it """" .
amy_harrison You are so weird Everyone laughs .
